website_summaries.verdict: Hand cart can be folded and placed in a backpack and comes with everything you need for moving heavy loads.
pros: Comes with flat bungee cord for securing cargo
Comes with a large backpack that, when collapsed, the hand truck can fit into for easy storage and travel
Features a unique all-wheel drive system
cons: The handlebars are made of plastic and some customers reported that they bend easily

customer_reviews.title: Height of handle when extended is perfect, and wheels seem strong enough to take abuse ...
customer_reviews.text: Urban commuter relief! Purchased to alleviate massive back pain from an outrageously heavy backpack that hauls around multiple laptops and chargers, shoes, lunch, and various notebooks in transit on trains, busses, and busy sidewalks. Used for the first time this morning, and very impressed at stability. Height of handle when extended is perfect, and wheels seem strong enough to take abuse from rushing up and down escalators and over and into curbs. Hopefully it lasts!

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We live in an apartment where we need to carry our groceries stuff from parking garage. We were shopping for a lightweight handtruck and fell in love this version due to the four wheel rotate feature. The front wheels manuever easily on bumpy surface, love it. It’s easy to fold and unfold, compact, lightweight and sturdy. Such a relief for us, no more carrying heavy groceries back and forth from the car.
customer_reviews.author: Dkpar

customer_reviews.title: It's strong and I am most pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: March 2017: It's strong and I am most pleased with the quality. It's so useful for many reasons, and my stuff stays off the floor at all times. It's primarily for my archery gear, and I wish I thought of it sooner. 5/30/17 Update: It's no longer standing upright and bends forward with my same gear. Meaning the load hasn't changed, but the cart no longer stands up on its own. I would be appreciative for any advice that fixes this.
customer_reviews.author: KIMBERLY

customer_reviews.title: It's a toy.  Absolute junk.
customer_reviews.text: This order started badly by not being delivered on the "guaranteed" date as promised, then continued to disappoint when I actually tried to use the thing. Wobbly handle, tipped over very easily when turning corners, bungees too short to reach around any meaningful payload. I wondered how they got 155 lbs of anything to stay on this piece of garbage. Tried to move two stacked boxes weighing less than 20 lbs each and it could hardly manage it. Don't waste your time or money.
customer_reviews.author: MrBill92124

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we had been looking for
customer_reviews.text: This item is perfect for the purpose we purchased it. My daughter lives on her campus and we're constantly ordering items to be delivered to her. This hand truck is compact and lightweight yet sturdy enough for her to transport deliveries from her mailroom.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Great for large band instruments!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my middle schooler, who has to lug around a large euphonium to and from school. This fit the bill perfectly! It took us a few tries to really get the straps on just right so that the instrument doesn't slide around (we criss-cross the straps first and then wrap the bungee cord around the whole thing twice) but this things has been a life saver! And it's very sturdy. I had my doubts that it would last very long because my son is very hard on his things and the cart is SO lightweight, I just didn't think it would hold up. But surprisingly, it has! Great little cart for a variety of needs.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A.

customer_reviews.title: HATE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I WISH I HAD SENT IT BACK! I FIGURED OUT WHAT THE PROBLEM IS. THERE IS A HUMP AT THE BASE WHEN THE HANDLE IS UNFOLDED. THE HUMP IS FOR THE TIRES. THIS THROWS OFF THE ENTIRE BALANCE OF THE DEVICE AND MAKES IT SO AWKWARD ITEMS WILL NOT STAY ON THE CART. i WILL BUILD UP THE BASE TO CLEAR THE HUMPS AND REEVALUATE. RIGHT NOW IT SUCKS A BIG PICKLE!
customer_reviews.author: 007 BOND

customer_reviews.title: they easily slide off the cart and then you have to ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fold up very small, so you have to store it in the airplane above the seats. Also if you have big suitcases, they easily slide off the cart and then you have to reload them.....maybe I can figure out a better way to keep the big suitcases on. I was carrying one 28" big suitcase, and one 21" suitcase. This hand truck does carry a heavy load. I used it to carry 2 cases of water and a case of pop onto our cruise ship, and it worked great! Saved us money so we didn't have to buy water and pop on the ship...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Had my shoulder replaced and decided to be smart w/my 20+ # (🙊) gym bag. Certainly helping to save my new parts!!!! Manuverability sometimes not so great. Has a tendancy to tip going over cracks in concrete. Nicely stands up-right though! Comes with a really long extra strap, I've managed well enough w/just the attached bottom straps. IMPORTANT to put cart up against wall or locker and step on center and pull handle down towards you to collapse. Then retract the handle. First section of handle always retracts. Second section not so much. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: clarkexpeditions

customer_reviews.title: it's great for moving a good amount of weight and folds ...
customer_reviews.text: Really solid but compact dolly. As described, it's great for moving a good amount of weight and folds up nicely for storage.
customer_reviews.author: NRL

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a lot of hand trucks before, but they never lasted long. This is one of the most durable hand truck, and looks like it is going to last for a long time. You can tell the difference compare to other cheap-built ones. It is so sturdy, you cannot find any weak part on the body. It comes with a bungee cord, very helpful when you carry a bulky stuff, hold it tight and less shaking. I am a technician, have to carry heavy tools bag all over the places. This lightweight but strong hand truck is exactly what I need.
customer_reviews.author: new life

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I should buy one of these earlier! Not really for luggages but for moving bulky bags in backyards, or from backyards to front yard. I have big bags of yard trash every a few months. Used to drag them but chances are, breaking bags and loose leaves everywhere. Now with this little cart, moving them around is so easy. I like the long elastic band they included in this package. Even though I don't really use them, but when I need one, it comes in handy. As described, light, easy to fold and unfold, so five stars.
customer_reviews.author: C. Snow

customer_reviews.title: poor design
customer_reviews.text: just used this today to bring in an office chair, in a box. This trolley is not easy to maneuver. Forget it if you have to go up and down one or two stairs. The area next to the handle is bulbous and sticks out. It pushed the box further out so that the whole thing won't stand on its own before toppling over. When you have to go up and down stairs the awful section that sticks out scrapes along the side of the stairs. This item is not worth the money. It is the worst design possible.
customer_reviews.author: k44993

customer_reviews.title: Handy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to haul out homeschool materials and library books around. We check out library books by the milk crate and it's tricky to wrangle two small children and everything else. Then I broke my foot and needed to use it more to haul more everyday items. It's a bit tricky to fold, but just give it a hard shove and it'll close up. It's sturdy, standing up well to the abuse of my kids. I can't speak to how much it can carry, we're using it mostly for books and such, but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia M Helgeson

customer_reviews.title: What a Sleeper
customer_reviews.text: For the purpose that I needed this for (moving houses), this more than exceeded my expectations. This is a very lightweight hand truck and carried everything I needed it to with ease. The handle locks into place and requires a bit of force to get it to fold down back to its original position. I like this because I know it won't fall apart on me while carrying boxes. Highly recommend this as a budget hand truck that can definitely get the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Heath Carriker

customer_reviews.title: VERY DISSAPPOINTED. I returned it. (Had to pay restock and shipping too)
customer_reviews.text: This item was a big disappointment. Flimsy, WON'T fold down. (You need a huge burly man to press down hard to make it fold.) The wheels are in the way at the bottom so you can't even push things flush up against it. The Bungies are lamely PERMANENTLY placed. I tried to haul 2 folding chairs and a thin board on this and the thing fell over in the street and I had to leave it there to go get help (because I had a wrist injury, and couldn't reload.) Only buy this is you are hauling a small box or something the size of a pineapple.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: It's ok. I've had this for a year. It's helped in some instances. It's very hard to maneuver and does not do turns well. While it folds up easy and takes less storage space, it really isn't as helpful as a regular metal hand truck would be. It only holds 65lbs and you can't slide it under anything. Everything has to be picked up and placed on top of it. If I could return it, I would. It's lasted this long as I don't use it much and do not put a lot of weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually to write a review, but this product really deserves it. After one year and a half I got it, I can say it's the best thing that I have ever bought. It's sturdy, practical and easy to maneuver it. I really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rossana

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to open up and fold down
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to open up and fold down. Was easy to strap in duffle bag in an upright position (sideways would have impeded pedestrians while traversing airport). wheels roll smoothly, cart is light. What remains to be seen if we can bring this aboard an airplane, as intended use is for going to and from different terminals in airports with relatively heavy duffle bag that lacks wheels. So far so good. Will update once it is put to actual travel use.
customer_reviews.author: renatenevada

customer_reviews.title: Helped me move out of my dorm
customer_reviews.text: I’m a student who moves apartments every academic year. This dolly is awesome! I was able to get 3 small boxes on it at once and not worry about them falling off.It kind of feels like it’s gonna fall apart when I’m opening and closing it, but it’s tough as nails. I dropped it down the stairwell and it still just like new. It’s super lightweight and takes up almost no space in my car. I’m not sure if this is the right dolly for a family moving homes, but it’s perfect for a student with a few car fulls of stuff. I recommend this to anyone doing a small move.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Adds convenience without a large footprint - great value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a small hand truck to move office equipment and supplies to a second floor office, but didn’t want to invest a lot in something I just use once in a while. I also wanted something compact. This one fit the bill! It comes folded - smaller than I expected when folded and comes with a bag to hold it. When expanded it can hold a surprising amount/weight. I’ve moved a printer, other office stuff, and even a twin mattress in a box. It also comes with a couple of bungy cords/straps which I appreciate. I can already tell this is a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette

customer_reviews.title: Great For Massage Tables
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take my massage table to clients' homes. It is very sturdy, easy to use. It fits my table quite well. I know that when I was reading other people's reviews, that is one feedback I wish someone would have gave as a massage therapist. The only complaint I have is that the back wheels aren't large enough to go up some stairs. Even with that flaw, I am really satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Millington, Life Coach & LMT

customer_reviews.title: Great for carrying a 5 Gallon Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Folding Hand Truck w/4 wheel-rotate) to carry my 5-gallon water bottles, when it comes to refilling my water dispenser. I found myself struggling to carry that heavy water bottle. I can’t believe how wonderful it is to have this hand truck instead. It’s well-made, sturdy, beautifully designed with all the additional accessories shown. I will share this product with my family & friends.
customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.title: and the cart folds down easily. There is a little give in the raised ...
customer_reviews.text: The platform is large and stable, the wheels are a solid material, possibly rubber, and the cart folds down easily. There is a little give in the raised handle, but the front wheels swivel readily, and the cart seems reliable. The cart fits easily in the carry bag and there is room for an extra plastic bag. It weighed in at 4.7lbs, a bit less than the 5lbs. mentioned, and is about 2.5" inches wider, and about 1.5" longer than the smaller size - so a slight trade off for stability and ease of use.
customer_reviews.author: grateful shopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this little dude. People are so impressed it folds up, and although it seems to weak or flimsy at first since it has a little give, this thing holds up! Moved 3 different mini fridges easily during move out at college. The bungee cords help so much! In retrospect the rotating wheels or bigger back wheels would be nice, but this thing is so handy and useful regardless. Don’t be afraid it’ll snap when you close it up! It bends but it’ll stay true to shape! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Great for carseats
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these hand trucks to transport carseats through the airport. The seats fit perfectly and are easily secured with the bungee straps that are included. We unloaded the seats, stored them in the bag and carried them on the plane. When we arrived, we put the seats back on the cart and were on our way! Takes about 2 minutes to secure the seat! The wheels are smooth and the handle is a great height. Our 5 year old was able to maneuver the cart with the seat attached through the airport himself. Highly recommend using this for your carseats! Bonus is it can be used for other purposes when not traveling!
customer_reviews.author: KEM1185

customer_reviews.title: Luggage Cart
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this luggage cart to carry my very heavy backpack with camera equipment through airports. It's easy to assemble and disassemble and fits perfectly under seat in front on plane. However, since it's so compact, I now keep it in my convertible (behind driver's seat) to carry groceries and other packages. Comes with an extra bungee cord that I have not found necessary to use so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tuscandreamer

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets
customer_reviews.text: No regrets-As advertised. As soon as this item arrived it was in perfect working order and all accessories included. Great design light weight easy to carry. Took it to the supermarket bought 2 cases of 18 count bottled beer, strapped them in, rolled it carefully 5 city blocks home. Didn’t have to use the bunge strap just with the attached fastener cords. Comes with handling care and warranty card. No regrets thank you.
customer_reviews.author: herman in manhattan

customer_reviews.title: great customer service; good cart
customer_reviews.text: I used this a handful of times before the platform broke...very disappointing. BUT their customer service was outstanding and they quickly replaced the cart. They really stand by their product. I use the cart for transporting a rather heavy white board and suitcase to my tutoring job. I didn't anticipate needing the flat bungee cord, but the size of my load made it difficult to secure with the attached bungee cords. I simply untied them and stored them and am using the flat cord. It rolls easily and I love that I can load it without my things actually sitting on the ground while I am loading them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little cart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this when I knew I was having my gallbladder removed and I couldn't lift for several weeks. This helped me get groceries in and out of the house, water plants, and move things around the house - like bags of dog food and cat little. I love it. I've got it folded and out of the way now, but when I need to move anything heavy, it is easy to pull out and fold out to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dgreer1986

customer_reviews.title: used for travel with luggage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use for a Land's End soft suitcase that I love. This works well, though is a bit harder to maneuver with two vs 4 wheels. The wheels are big enough to be solid and work well when you aren't in a hurry and generally going in a straight line. I do recommend this product and it seems very well made. I used it on a trip to Australia and I held up very well and with the hand truck my luggage, while a bit oversized got waived on through as it is squishable. I saw several hard sized bags get spun to checked luggage that were much smaller than my bag. Thanks Hand Truck!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to fold
customer_reviews.text: The instructions are not clear and I am still having trouble folding up the bottom piece. The handle telescopes easily. You're supposed to put your foot on the bottom piece and the cart wants to take off. Even when it is laying down, it rolls by itself. I'm sure I'll get used to using it, but for now, it is a bit unwieldy. Once I have equipment on it, it works well as a cart.
customer_reviews.author: Irene Hartfield

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks!
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it about 3-4 times, but the back doesn’t stay locked upright! What’s the point then!? I have rheumatoid arthritis and I was really hoping this was going to help with all the traveling I do, but it does nothing! Mostly I just wrestle around trying to get it to work correctly! So frustrating and such a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Smith

customer_reviews.title: Consistently impressed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hand truck for a grueling 5 week cross country Amtrak book tour. I had it loaded up consistently with 25-50lbs of books and dragged it for countless miles through city streets, dropped it into countless rideshare trunks, and it survived it all. As another reviewer said, the hooks on the attached bungie cords are not sturdy. Mine broke on the last leg of the tour, but they're easily replaced. The best thing was that when I wasn't using it to move books, I could collapse it and strap it to my backpack and it was still small enough to fit in my carry-on luggage! Very happy overall with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: capitolitch

customer_reviews.title: Useful tool
customer_reviews.text: It is smaller than I thought but very strong. We are renovating the house recently so there are a lot of things to move around. I planned to buy such a cart before but didn't want to spend a lot of money. I packed my husband's and myself's books in cardboard boxes. They are really heavy. This cart really meets my requirements. The price is reasonable and practical. Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Poor Support for Softsided Items.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this trolley to carry backpacks and large tote bags. This was a big mistake because no matter how tight I apply cords around the bags, something always comes loose and slips. Today, while crossing the street the backpack slipped off the hand truck. Fortunately, traffic was very light and could retrieve the backpack before it caused any traffic problems. I just can't use it as a soft-sided luggage carrier anymore.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hollins

customer_reviews.title: for luggage and small packages this is useful no way this will hold 164 lbs in my
customer_reviews.text: the hand truck or luggage carrier is way too light for any heavy object. I got an air conditioner yesterday that weighed 58 lbs. with the handle extended I almost got hit by handle because air conditioner slid off the bottom. put handle back down and used as dolly to move ino bedroom. the handle is so light you can't move heavy objects. for luggage and small packages this is useful no way this will hold 164 lbs in my opinion
customer_reviews.author: bigman

customer_reviews.title: I really like the design of the back wheels on this truck
customer_reviews.text: This is a NARROW truck - if you are planning to move wider boxes (even light weight), it will not work. I bought this truck to use at my horse barn to unload 50 pounds grain bags and 40 pound shaving bags. They just fall off from this truck while i'm moving them. That didn't happen with my previous small truck. I really like the design of the back wheels on this truck, since they don't fold - they are not as easily damaged. wish the base was a 1/2 foot wider!!! My last truck had folding wheels and they broke after several months of once per week use.
customer_reviews.author: Naramia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for toddler seat transport
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Read another review and bought this to haul a car seat around the airport. What a great solution and value! Our toddler rode the car seat around the airport and loved sitting comfortably in her seat. We were able to secure the car seat to the dolly really tight and within a couple of minutes. It doesn’t all fit on the security conveyor but the officer took it all together and just tested it by hand. We didn’t have to take the car seat off the dolly.
customer_reviews.author: Asif Daud

customer_reviews.title: Almost Exactly What I need...
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy that I decided to "squander" and spend some extra money on this model. It is easy to unfold and fold. The real value is that it can handle 70 to 100 pound boxes .that I need it to handle. It is suitable for moving the concrete floor above. Just slide them and you're done. So that the trolley is easy to go up the stairs into the house. He is very easy to store. It is small enough to stay in the back seat of every car.
customer_reviews.author: zippokk01

customer_reviews.title: Amazon Customer Service have an AWESOME staff.
customer_reviews.text: I'd like to commend the Customer Service Dept. for being SO professional, nice, friendly, respectful, an SO willing to work with you to make things right; They will bend over backwards to make things right and will not let you go away with a "bad taste in your mouth". I've talked several different Service Reps. down through to the last 2-3 yrs. and I feel that I know them personally... I can't say enough good things about the Service Reps. at Amazon. Thank you Amazon! :-))) Sincerely, William Stafford (aka Motown Willie)
customer_reviews.author: William H. Stafford

customer_reviews.title: Handle is a little flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this cart once. I bought it to help me carry heavy items especially my water jugs. Does not maneuver well especially going Dow a small decline. I am not very happy with it. I have bought two, one for my friend’s birthday and one for me. I am a little embarrassed for giving this to my friend as a present 🎁.
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: I really like it
customer_reviews.text: This hand truck is very easy to use. I’ve always wanted something like this to carry heavy items for me, and this is perfect. I don’t have to worry about the weight of the items when deciding whether or not to buy it aside from its price. It’s very easy to fold and only takes up a tiny amount of space. This hand truck comes with a small backpack and you can place the truck inside and carry it on your back when not needed. I really recommend this for anyone who’s considering buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel glover

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small weight holding!
customer_reviews.text: As a single mom, this is the perfect hand truck I can find on the market! It is so light weight and easy to fold! You can easily put it in anywhere after folding it, because it won’t take that much space, so thin and small! But it does its job pretty well! I never try 70kg but tried at least 50kg and works great! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Toxilatte L

customer_reviews.title: Holds up well. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Holds up very well to carrying heavy loads (I tested up to 80 lbs). Goes down stairs well. Folds up easily Only thing that wasn't intuitive was how to get the hooked cords put of the way when I don't need them for a load. I figured out I can loop them along the bottom of the truck and then latch the hooks on to a piece of the handlebar part Really good little dolly for the price. Very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: Light-weight, sturdy hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for what we needed. Our daughter is a high school cheerleader and has a 2.5-foot tall wooden box she needs to take to all football games. It's too bulky for her to carry and it's on the heavy side. It fits on this hand truck beautifully, and will make her life a lot easier. The truck is light-weight, sturdy and easy to fold and open back up. Now that we have it, I will certainly be able to use it and save my back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Patty B

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a side job delivering catering orders to businesses. This thing has absolutely saved my back and shoulders. The delivery bags are heavy and awkward to carry, but since buying this I’m super fast and efficient with my deliveries. I’m amazed at how smoothly it rolls through the downtown streets! Nothing moves around once it’s tied down with the attached straps ( included ). It’s an incredible value and I couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Dingus Dezigns

customer_reviews.title: Great for our car seat!
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfect for taking our heavy Diono car seat with us in the plane. Straps secure quickly, and can easily be collapsed to fit in the overhead. Easiest part of taking a little one on a plane trip is to have him sit in his own car seat. Safe, secure and familiar.
customer_reviews.author: Mike L

customer_reviews.title: Great cart. Bad handle.
customer_reviews.text: I had this cart for about a year and used it almost daily for work. I’m in construction and would put my Husky tool bag on it that weighs about 35-40 pounds. And this cart worked awesome until the telescoping part of the handle started to come apart. One side would just pop out. I was usually able to pop it back in and it would be fine. But this last time it popped out the whole mechanism pretty much exploded preventing it from being fixed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Roll with ease
customer_reviews.text: Nice little hand truck. Built in bungee cords were strong and handy. Wished the platform was a little wider but it worked fine. Rolled smoothly. Easy to lift when needed. If it folds down, I didn't figure how to. Will go back to read. Used it transport plastic bin and chairs through parking garage, through Marta train station and down several blocks in Atlanta to and thru Centinnel Park.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Shin

customer_reviews.title: for basic items it is useful
customer_reviews.text: This cart is useful for basic items. Because of the size of the platform, and where the clips mount some items are not as appropriate for this car. it is good for basic items, but the 70kg part ... it might be rated for moving that much but i am not sure about it. opening and folding it up is good and the straps and bag are helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous-Individual

customer_reviews.title: Unstable and hard to use.
customer_reviews.text: It is very unstable to push or pull use 4 wheels because it is very narrow between wheels. It is better when only use 2 back wheels on upright position. But still you must very carefully if the load is wide like a file box. Better to use the yellow bungee cord to secure the load. The overall construction seems very good. Two black cords are too short to hold on any load that is more than half way high. After few month I end up with use another brand cart.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Unfold, Use, Refold, Store - Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: I use this Folding Hand Truck to wheel my musical instrument to and from lessons. Works perfect for me with the two bungee-cords criss-crossed around my instrument case, the top of Folding Hand Truck extended Handle comes to the exact same height as the handle that is on top of my instrument case so I can hold onto both handles for extra security. Wheels are sturdy enough and the hand truck is light enough that where I need to lift instrument case and hand truck together to get up and down curbs or a couple of stairs, it's not a problem. Thinking of buying a 2nd hand truck.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Great for rolling around toddler car seat chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the way to go if you need to bring your baby toddler car seat with you. the straps made it easy to secure my large kids seat to it (Graco convertible). Kid loved it, we loved it, was a good experience. We were unsure if the car rentals in Tahiti would have kid seat rentals so we carried ours with this and it worked great. suggest a car seat bag, this will easily fit within any selection you choose.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Muhlestein

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy light duty hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a sturdy handtruck. Rolling it around my living room I have no maneuverability problems. Telescoping handle is high enough for both my husband and myself. Folding it’s a little awkward, but the directions are adequate and easy to follow. The bonus adjustable strap mentioned in the product detail is not an adjustable strap. It’s a plain flat strap. A little disappointed in that, because it was a key selling point for me. Will inquire on the adjustable strap as that was expected with this product. Otherwise looking forward to using this hand truck in my upcoming travels.
customer_reviews.author: JoyfulGA

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not easy to use, useless swivel wheel
customer_reviews.text: The good thing is lightweight. Con: The handle is not stable. It’s hard to manipulate it. The swirl front wheel is useless. The truck keeps falling forward when push, and it’s hard to control the direction if pull. The price is higher than 800lb hand truck which is extremely strong and stable. The hook broke on the first day of use. And then it was stolen/taken. Won’t buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Wheel fell off after first use
customer_reviews.text: On my first day of school at my university campus, I went to one class, was walking to my next one with my little cart that is holding my backpack, and the wheel feel off. Can’t find it, either. Really? Not just the first day of school, but only after one class?
customer_reviews.author: SomethingOrOther

customer_reviews.title: Great Hand Truck used as Recycling Container Dolly
customer_reviews.text: I needed a way to push the 65 gallon commercial recycling wheeled container up the driveway. The container comes from the garbage removal company and only has two wheels which means I have to balance the container on the wheels while pushing. If I drag it, I loose my grip and it slides back to the bottom. The folding hand truck fits under the front on the container and allows me to push it to the top with a lot less effort. May not work for everyone but it did for my circumstances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pack rat travelers like us...
customer_reviews.text: We always over pack when we try to pack light for traveling. This rolling cart is awesome, light, compact, and moves well. Here is a picture of our overnight overpacking for our weekend hotel stay. If this looks like you, then you must buy one!
customer_reviews.author: E. King

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: This is made sturdy, good to use as a dolly with something heavy but not with something light like a cello(smallest cello, she's a tiny 5th grader) or on all 4 wheels. I bought it because my daughter started orchestra but she's tiny, carries her bag pack, her band bag, AND her cello. Well, it would easily tip over with my daughter's band bag and small cello which she got frustrated and gave up using it. She tried using it as a dolly and on all 4 wheels... nothing worked..it would tip sideways.
customer_reviews.author: JeepN

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was sturdier.
customer_reviews.text: I like the compact size. My load wobbled left to right and would lift the wheels off the ground. The instructions said you have to walk slow and that’s true. Instructions were very skimpy. To fold the truck, it said to step on the base and pull the retracted handle back down and pull down. I did that and it was very hard to pull down. I pulled so hard, the base cracked. Now it’s useless after one use. Please don’t make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: surelyme

customer_reviews.title: The extra yellow strap is very nice - helps secure instrument case to the hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for use as a Baritone (in case) transporter. Used once so far and appears to work well. The extra yellow strap is very nice - helps secure instrument case to the hand truck. Wish the platform was just a little bigger. Will give more review once we've used it more this summer - to/from band camp.
customer_reviews.author: quick-reads McGee

customer_reviews.title: Durable and compact
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this cart because our house has no driveway or garage. We always face the issues that we have to carry stuffs from street to our main entrance which is on the side of the house. We have water delivery every month but they only leave the bottles in front of the house even though we have complained a couple times. My husband has to carry them one by one walks through the long sidewalk. By using this cart, it definitely save my husband’ back. This cart is durable. It can be folded up so it can fit in a tight space.
customer_reviews.author: Xiao M.

customer_reviews.title: I probably should have sent this back. It was ...
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have sent this back. It was difficult opening it and closing it. I am a woman, and the one I had before was lighter and easier to use. I had to get a neighbor man to help. He is rather large and he had a hard time also, especially closing it. If I had kept the box, I would have sent it back, but I live in a condo and o storage.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and small enough to fit anywhere!! Very Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase made for our very active family! it's easy to use and works perfect and effectively with our Graco Extend to fit car seat!!! its fold up so small and fits our the outside of a suitcase! its will even fit in the overhead compartment in the plane without taking to much room!
customer_reviews.author: SIERRA  A

customer_reviews.title: Great looking product.
customer_reviews.text: At first when I got it, it really looked small. But after expanding it to its full size, it was pretty big. I like the bungee cords that come with it. I supply doctor's offices with brochures for patients. After restocking the brochures, I have to take the leftovers and expired item back. Sometimes it can be 5 or 6 boxes. This will really help me, so I don't have to make multiple trips to my care and back through the hospital. I truly recommend this product. I love the bag that comes with it. It makes it real easy to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J Beard

customer_reviews.title: Not useful for anything medium to large.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing "folds". The handle goes down. It is not as compact. The base is also narrow. I purchased this to make traveling with my massage table easier. Doesn't help in the slightest. It actually makes it harder. Probably good for small boxes.
customer_reviews.author: k. ray

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous product great seller
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first one of these in 2017. I AM STILL USING IT AND STILL THRILLED!!!! Very strong, VERY easy to use and to fold away. Even the bungee cord straps are still in great shape. I am a Structural Bodywork Professional and use this in rain, snow and ice, heat, etc., bang it up and down stairs and curbs with my table attached multiple times a day and it still performs like new. Buying again because when (if) it does ever give out (entropy is an indisputable force of the universe), I don't ever want to be without it. Thanks for such a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jane

customer_reviews.title: Durable, made from plastic
customer_reviews.text: Really though, its sturdy and doesn't take up space. It has straps which helps a lot. Carries things, lifts things, works well with others. It helped us while we moved and it didn't break down. In short it's a great replacement for our friend Frank who does none of those things.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality folding hand truck. It has very lightweight on it and can fold it to small size, so I can save a lot of space when I don't use it. Especially, when I take this in my car, it really take less space. Even though this cart looks small, but it really can carry heavy stuff. I use this to move two big boxes from my car( about 110 lb) , it really can handle it with no problem. Really like this for family use.
customer_reviews.author: yi

customer_reviews.title: Compacted and very portable.
customer_reviews.text: We needed to help our friend move out of their home and they had some heavy items. We had a hand truck but it was very difficult to move around. This one to my surprise was smaller and looked like a toy for children. It is light and makes our life easier when moving.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Real work horse!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little hand truck! I've used it to haul 70lbs of boxes from a hotel to a convention center in Las Vegas and it got through all terrains tile, concrete, carpet. I use it in my daily life too taking groceries from the car to our third floor apartment. It is so light and compact that I carried it in my backpack while traveling for a convention.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah-Jane

customer_reviews.title: not useful, small wheels
customer_reviews.text: this "hand truck" has way too small of a platform and too small of wheels, making it very cumbersome to push around and load anything that you would actually want to transport. Another problem is the handle bar is not tall enough for anyone around 5' 7" or taller. I'm 5' 11 and my back hurt pushing a camera system that weighed just 25 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stable!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! Over a year later and many airport trips and this cart is working perfectly. I'm 6'3"and the handle is just tall enough and the wheels are set apart just enough to keep it fairly stable over uneven surfaces. So far no disability issues. This was a perfect find for frequent traveling.
customer_reviews.author: JetJock

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from Europe where this passed the test for rolling baggage for 2 months. Like the 4 wheels, which mean you can change direction in tight spaces. Carried on fine on airplanes. I used an extra bungee for tying on larger loads. The bungees with the cart aren't as strong/long lasting as they could be. It was easy to set up and take down. I used it with two canvas bags and with a canvas bag/med. sized backpack filled with books.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: Easy, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Easy! So nice not to have to assemble anything. I had to move a very heavy, long planter off of my porch in this worked wonders: went down the steps easily and no tipping over! The bungees on it are very nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: DHHoy

customer_reviews.title: Hubby and I both like it.
customer_reviews.text: Hubby travels for work and needed something portable and SMALL when folded. He likes this a lot. I just took it on a work trip and LOVED it. One trip got my bags, laptop, and work gear all in from the car in one trip. I've also used it to carry banker's boxes of files to and from the car. You MUST follow the directions folding it back up, but if you do, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: MollieDuke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my intended purpose!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little hand truck as an accessory for my small camper van to ease the task of moving heavier awkward items when camping, such as 5-gallon water jugs, propane tanks, firewood bundles, etc. It's a simple, easy to use and thoughtful design, and feels perfectly strong enough to handle anything I might want to move with it, which will probably never exceed a load of 50-60 lbs. And it's small size when folded up makes it great and easy to store. It's perfect for my intended purposes. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: The reviews sold me!
customer_reviews.text: I've used this a couple of times and it easily hauled a 50 lb bag of quikrete, an 8qt bag of potting soil and a dozen 12 oz mason jars in one load with ease. I highly recommend this product and appreciate the extra strap provided.
customer_reviews.author: Grapevine

customer_reviews.title: A must have for men who complain about hauling holiday boxes up from the basement!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the attached cords to keep items in place. That is very handy when going up & down stairs! And when folded up, it’s small enough to easily store. It won’t replace a dolly for furniture or anything, but we stacked several boxes on that sucker!
customer_reviews.author: Angie A

customer_reviews.title: Worked as I needed it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to easily move my toddler's carseat in the airport and it's great. It took me a couple of tries at home to figure out the best and easiest way to secure the seat to the base, but once done it was a breeze at the actual airport.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Used for Travel
customer_reviews.text: We used the this for a vacation travel with our 2yo. it was very useful - we had put 2 carryon luggage's and a travel carseat on it. It was a tremendous help. However, I wish it had spinner wheals - it was difficult to make turns at which point the luggage would shift and start falling off. Once at the destination, we were able to fold it and put in the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Asima Cullu

customer_reviews.title: steps or curbs are a problem
customer_reviews.text: I thought the cart was just what I was looking for until I tried to wheel a box of ceramic tiles. Box was about 30 lbs and unless the item is directly centered, and wheeled on level ground, cart easily tips, as I found out when I tried to wheel it up my front walk that's slightly pitched. It was comedy show trying to get the cart and tiles up 3 stairs. The wheels are too small and the "fenders" over the wheels prevent the cart from lifting from step to step. So for me, the cart has very limited use and I need a different one to get my stuff into the house.
customer_reviews.author: eileen

customer_reviews.title: Great portable hand truck
customer_reviews.text: Already assembled upon arrival so quick to use right away. Handled a 25 lb box of books with ease to take to Staples to ship out. Complimented on its portability by the Staples staff member. Easy to collapse and store in the bag for later use. Perfect for transporting any heavier boxes or objects around.
customer_reviews.author: H. S. GALE

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, sturdy, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This comes in so handy. It’s not super light but it’s light enough to throw in your luggage or carry on and the quality is there. Nice and sturdy. I used to have a small, less sturdy one and I ended up throwing it out. This one is easy to use which is a must.
customer_reviews.author: ha-Y-E

customer_reviews.title: Solid and 4 wheels help a lot. However the ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid and 4 wheels help a lot. However the straps are not as functional as they could be. The attached straps are too short to accommodate much of a load. The additional strap is much longer but not elastic and therefore requires a lot a jury rigging. I use a cart from the garage to the 3rd floor several times a week. I always have a collapsible box to put groceries, etc. in but the straps are too short to keep it on. The other luggage strap is cumbersome.
customer_reviews.author: Mormor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small jobs
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this to move a small filing cabinet. it does hold up to 140 lb, Keep it in my car, handy, when i go to the post office with my packages, small luggage pieces, and other things . It folds up, but you have to push very hard.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. light weight and folds up into a very convenient size. I bought this for my daughter to use with her school bag (which is very heavy). I have tried trolley bags - but they always had some deficiency, kept breaking or wheels kept falling off. So I got a large/strong regular school bag and this folding hand Truck - and that's the end of my woes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler cart
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler cart for your igloo coolers. I love this and makes a super easier transporting my cooler around instead of lugging around by hand it's just so much easier especially if it's full and heavy. I definitely would recommend this to anybody who has a large cooler and goes to any events or theme parks.
customer_reviews.author: P. Velez

customer_reviews.title: I travel frequently and I also find that it fits quite easily under airplane seats and in overhead storage
customer_reviews.text: This folding dolly is very durable and has not broken on me. I've used it on smooth airport floors to the rough and tumble of sidewalks, and it has not broken on me. I travel frequently and I also find that it fits quite easily under airplane seats and in overhead storage, even in small regional planes with seating arrangements that are 1 left 2 right.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Very handy handtruck!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. I bought this for my husband because he’s a musician and he has to carry his amp and other accessories on gigs. He can carry all of his stuff on one trip and I am so happy to see him use it. It was affordable and it is durable and it’s perfect for what we need to use it for. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Marty  Smith

customer_reviews.title: Size matters!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this, but we needed it for my daughter's cheer box. It didn't work well for that and was very unstable. Her box was to wide. Returning was easy. I would suggest that if you need one, measure what you are hauling and don't let it go over the sides too much.
customer_reviews.author: Carlin

customer_reviews.title: Great sturdy folding handtruck
customer_reviews.text: This item is sturdy, lightweight, and easy to fold up. I put some 40 pounds of packs and bags on it, and it easily could handle much more. Two bungie cords are already conveniently attached, and a long yellow elastic strap is also provided. The four wheels are rugged and make for easy handling. A canvas bag for the folded-up cart is included. I enthusiastically recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sussman

customer_reviews.title: Comments
customer_reviews.text: This is built to only hold small boxes and when you pull it open it keeps tilting over. A bit annoying to use and I've had parcels fall off because it can't take the weight and it keeps tilting to the side or over. It needs a larger base, but it did come with good straps but that still isn't much help due as it still tilts forward.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Francis

customer_reviews.title: Great for hulling a car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to transport my Britax convertible car seat, with toddler strapped in, through the airport (about 40 pounds). He loved it. Not intended for this use, and was not stable when left sitting upright, but made traveling solo a breeze. I have not used it for it's intended purpose of hauling boxes and such, but am confident that it would work well.
customer_reviews.author: SKvic

customer_reviews.title: Feels cheap, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this too much, but it has a cheap feel to it. the base is pretty small. Folds and unfolds super easy, very small footprint wherever you store it. Comes with the strap and backpack. I probably wouldn't buy it again, but if someone I knew liked it I would encourage them to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Use it for my massage table
customer_reviews.text: I use this to transport my massage table. Overall works great.. because it's so light sometimes taking a corner it tips a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: This dolly was exactly what I needed to easily move a heavy and bulky parcel from my car to the UPS store. The attached elastic straps were sufficient to hold the box securely, but it came with an additional strap, if needed. Afterwards, it was an easy task to fold up the dolly and place it in the included storage bag. It's lightweight, portable, and a very useful product!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight & rolls smoothly
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my massage table. The adjustable bungee that came with it its extremely helpful. My son could use for his bowling bags. It's lightweight & rolls smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: pucklizard

customer_reviews.title: Works great for transporting old "portable" sewing machine in its own case.
customer_reviews.text: This worked perfectly to haul my old "portable" sewing machine that's in its own hard case. I was able to strap it, as sewing box, and some other things, and walk with ease from the car to the building. This sure beat carrying a 50# machine by hand!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

product_meta.title: Folding Hand Truck, 70 Kg/155 lbs Heavy Duty 4-Wheel Solid Construction Utility Cart Compact and Lightweight for Luggage, Personal, Travel, Auto, Moving and Office Use - Portable Fold Up Dolly by ROYI
feature_bullets: 【Fold Up for Easy Storage】 Can Be Folded Up Easily in Few Seconds. With The Compact Size And Light Weight(4 lbs), You Can Put into The Backpack after Folded And Won’t Feel Heavy. Labor saving tips: Please push your extended handle to the base first when folding the handle. Then shrink the extended long handle.

【Heavy Duty And Durable】 The Drawbar is Made of Thickened Steel Material, Which is More Durable Than Other Hand Trucks. Can Hold Up to 155 lbs Capacity And Not Easy to Shake When Pulling. To ensure the stability, we suggest customers to place the goods in the middle of the truck base and mind your speed during using, also walk slowly when you are using it in rough road
【High Quality Tank Wheels】 Upgraded Tank Wheels are 3 Times More Durable Than Other Rubber Wheels in The Market, Which are More Wear-resistant, Noiseless And Long Using Life

【With Adjustable Bungee Cord and Larger Capacity Backpack】 Flat bungee band, adjustable, wider, longer and more durable.You can adjustable length according to demand, super strech up to 188 inches! Perfect for carrying large-size boxes, heavy stuff, packages, goods also, you can put your hand truck in this backpack (size: L:25.2 inch/H:16.5 inch), saving you energy and time.
【Large Base Plate】 Can Hold Large-size Stuff and Not Easy to Shake When Pulling. Meanwhile, The Base Plate is Made of Thickened High Quality PP Plastic, Which Makes The Cart More Durable

specifications.Material Type: Thickened Steel Material & Thickened PP Plastic
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars1,020 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
